example.text: Make no mistake, inflation is a tax on all Americans, and Democrats' massive expansion of government spending has fueled rampant inflation and has put heavy financial strains on Main Street America. As we near the final days of the one-party Democrat rule in Washington, Republicans are ready to rein in reckless spending and work to restore fiscal sanity in Washington.

The China Financial Threat Mitigation Act - takes an important step in addressing these concerns by requiring the Department of Treasury to report on the risks coming from the Chinese financial sector, along with recommendations on strengthening international cooperation to monitor and mitigate these risks.
